      • PlayerBoard

        public PlayerBoard(GameCharacter character,
                   java.lang.String nickname,
                   java.util.Map<AmmoType,java.lang.Integer> availableAmmos,
                   java.util.List<GameCharacter> revengeMarks,
                   java.util.List<GameCharacter> damages,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> killshotPoints,
                   java.util.List<Weapon> unloadedWeapons,
                   int weaponsNumber,
                   int powerupsNumber,
                   boolean dead)
        Class constructor, it builds a player board when the game is resumed after a save
        Parameters:
        character - of which the player board has to be built
        nickname - of which the player board has to be built
        availableAmmos - Map with ammo type and its quantity
        revengeMarks - List of the game characters which has marked the player
        damages - List of the game characters which has damaged the player
        killshotPoints - List of the kill shot points
        unloadedWeapons - List of the unloaded weapons
        weaponsNumber - amount of weapons
        powerupsNumber - amount of powerups
        dead - true if player is dead, else false
